name: meˈloːnpuːp
description:
🍉💩 is a short plaything for 1 to 2 player. Made for 🍉 Melon Game Jam 🍉!


🎮 recommended!

Tweeeeeeet me your highscore @notbanachtarski! 🏆


Made by nicole voec 🌌

Special thanks to my ✨spacebabe✨ julia for providing her voice.

Additional sfx by apolloaiello, thearxx08, ttptp, gregstermatic, pawsound, MisterLockbridge12. Tweemoji made by twitter humans blubblub

This game is free for anyone to tinker around with.
PS: It's pronounced [meˈloːnpuːp].
